doc.after: For a period of time in the early 20th Century Liberia became a U S protectorate 19 In the mid 20th century Liberia gradually began to modernize with American assistance Both the Freeport of Monrovia and Roberts International Airport were built by U S personnel through the Lend Lease program during World War II 20 President William Tubman encouraged foreign investment in the country resulting in the second highest rate of economic growth in the world during the 1950s 20
